pages.text: The $(mob)Bald Eagle$() is a passive flying animal that does not spawn naturally in the $(thing)Overworld$(). Players must perform the $(thing)Eagle Dance Ceremony$() near a $(l:minecraft_parrot)$(mob)Parrot$() to imbue it with power, transforming it into a $(mob)Bald Eagle$(). They can be bred with any raw fish.
$(mob)Bald Eagles$() drops $(item)Eagle Bone$() on death. This bone can be used to craft the $(item)Eagle Bone Flute$(), and can be used as a normal $(item)Bone$() in other recipes.
The $(mob)Eagle$() drops $(item)Eagle Feather$() on death. This bone can be used to craft the $(item)Eagle Bone Flute$(), and can be used as a normal $(thing)Feather$() in other recipes.
